mapper.select: select d.id id, d.name name, d.phone phone, d.address address, d.create_time create_time, d.modified_time modified_time, d.mgr_id mgr_id, IFNULL(( select count(*) from tb_user u where u.department_id = d.id and u.deleted = 0 group by u.department_id), 0) as deptCount from tb_department d ${ew.customSqlSegment}
